title: Ethics in the computer age
brief_description: Examines the loss of revenue suffered by the designers and producers of computer software caused by the pirating of video games. The focus is on the theft of “intellectual property” by people using computers in their homes. It also explains the dangers of hackers accessing sensitive information and the potentially life-endangering results of tampering with that information.
